ValidationRule.description: When assigning the AR Case to the queue, only the most recent queue will be allowed to be selected
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Setup.UPSD_Bypass_Validation_Rules_Triggers__c.Bypass_Case_Validation_rules__c), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'CEC_Assistance_Required_Case', CEC_Updated_from_IWT__c = false, NOT($Profile.Name = 'UPS CEC Admin'), NOT($Profile.Name == 'System Administrator'), AND (ISCHANGED(OwnerId), ISCHANGED(CEC_Original_Queue_Name__c)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Cases cannot be assigned to this queue or user.
